snippet.title: Grey Skies A War of the Worlds Story Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Add the game to your wishlist!
https://www.steelartssoftware.com/grey-skies


Xbox One and PS4

https://www.steelartssoftware.com/grey-skies

Grey Skies: A War of the Worlds Story coming November 5 to PS4, Xbox One and PC!

Grey Skies is a stealth based single player adventure that throws you right into the middle of the Martian invasion. Play as Harper through her personal story amidst the most significant event in human history. Encounter iconic Martian tools such as Tripods, Red Weed and Black Smoke.
